#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll rev(ll x)
{
    ll res=0;
    while(x>0)
    {
        res=(res<<1) +(res<<3) +x%10;
        x/=10;
    }
    return res;
}
bool palin(ll x)
{
    return x!=rev(x)?true:false;
}
int main()
{
    int t; cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,tmp,cnt=0; cin>>n;
        while(palin(n))
        {
            tmp=rev(n);
            n+=tmp;
            cnt++;
        }
        printf("%lld %lld\n",cnt,n);
    }
}
